Package net.sf.taverna.cagrid.servicewrapper

caGrid service wrapping of the public analytical services (InterProScan and NCBI BLAST provided by EBI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AnalyticalService Interface of an analytical service that can be generated using axis/CXF or using internal classes of Taverna such as the wsdl-generic module.
DataConverter Convert data between caGrid-style data (conforming to the UML model) and the actual data format used by the analytical service.
 

Class Summary
AnalyticalServiceInput Analytical service's input - consists of input parameters for the job and the actual input data.
AnalyticalServiceInputData Analytical service's input data in the actual service's format.
AnalyticalServiceInputParams Analytical service's input parameters in the actual service's format.
AnalyticalServiceOutput Analytical service's output results in the actual service's format.
CaGridInput Input data for the analytical service in caGrid format according to the silver-level compatible UML model.
CaGridOutput Analytical service output data in caGrid format according to the silver-level compatible UML model.
ServiceInvoker Invoke the actual InterProScan service using its data formats.
WrappedService Actual caGrid service to be exposed using gRavi or similar that wraps an analytical service such as EBI's InterProScan or NCBI BLAST.
 

Enum Summary
AnalyticalService.JOB_STATUS  
 

Package net.sf.taverna.cagrid.servicewrapper Description

caGrid service wrapping of the public analytical services (InterProScan and NCBI BLAST provided by EBI.

The public caGrid service is represented by WrappedService.

The inputs and output of the caGrid service are to be defined by the caBIG silver-level compatible UML model to be provided separately as part of the caGrid-Taverna integration project. The CaGridInput and CaGridOutput beans are placeholders for the actual beans to be auto-generated from the XMI files.

Internally, WrappedService will use the DataConverter to convert the input data to the format expected by the actual analytical service (placeholder AnalyticalServiceInput), use ServiceInvoker to invoke the service, and convert the output data (placeholder AnalyticalServiceOutput) using the converter and returning it to the caller of the caGrid service.
